message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $180?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $190.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $160?
I'm getting closer to your budget, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $175 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $155?
I'm getting close to your budget, and I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell it to you for $170.
I really like the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $160?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $165. This is my final offer.
I really want this product, but I've got to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $150?
